name: Frosted Glass
description: A Translucent Styling for Player.me, a Gamer focused Social Network and the new home of the Strexm Overlay Service
additional_info:
The Settings Modal Photo has a variable you can change in the style called "--SettingsBG" which you can change to whatever you want, but its a good idea to have it match your feed BG

FEB 11 2019: Updated to work with the new stuff.
APR 07 2019: Updates to the profile page, made banner transparent (as a test, ideally i'd like this to be selectable but CSS is limited without JS) and made about readable with its own background to match the scheme of the userstyle.
